core_prompt: Design a minimalist R monogram logo where the bowl of the R contains a precise circular lens/iris shape. The lens is integrated, not pasted. Use balanced stroke weight, calm geometry, and one intelligent cut that suggests focus and analysis. Optional accent color: #1A73E8 on white.
full_prompt:
Design a minimalist R monogram logo where the bowl of the R contains a precise circular lens/iris shape. The lens is integrated, not pasted. Use balanced stroke weight, calm geometry, and one intelligent cut that suggests focus and analysis. Optional accent color: #1A73E8 on white.

single logo mark, flat vector, geometric precision, centered composition, white background, no text, no wordmark, no mockup, no shadows, no gradients unless specified, no photorealism, high contrast, export-ready brand symbol. avoid: 3D, bevel, shadow, mockup, gradient overload, tiny details, photorealism, watermark, extra symbols, letters beyond intended mark.

core_prompt: Create a geometric R logo mark built from two solid forms connected by one clean bridge element at the midsection, symbolizing trusted connection across people. Keep silhouette bold and memorable. Monochrome first.
full_prompt:
Create a geometric R logo mark built from two solid forms connected by one clean bridge element at the midsection, symbolizing trusted connection across people. Keep silhouette bold and memorable. Monochrome first.

core_prompt: Create an abstract logo mark with one central node and one near-complete orbital ring that opens into a subtle directional break. The form should feel intelligent, calm, and ownable, with minimal components and strong negative space.

core_prompt: Design a minimal circular logo where a single diagonal notch transforms an almost-complete ring into an implied R structure. The notch must feel intentional and iconic, not decorative.

core_prompt: Generate a monoline R symbol formed by one continuous path with one decisive directional turn. Keep stroke endings purposeful and compact. The logo should remain legible at app icon size.
